titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Gouldsbrough in Yorke-shire, before the right worshipfull Sir Richard Hutton knight, one of His Maiesties iustices of the Court of Common Pleas
titleStmt.author: Oxley, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard
